original: Majjhima Nikāya 103
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Kintisutta
analyzed: kintisutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā pisinārāyaṁ viharati baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā pisinārāyam viharati bali haraṇe vana saṇḍe

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “kinti vo, bhikkhave, mayi hoti:
analyzed: kinti vaḥ bhikkhave mayi hoti

original: ‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ
analyzed: cīvara hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhammam deseti piṇḍapāta hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhamma

original: deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo
analyzed: deseti senāsana hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhammam deseti iti bhava abhava hetu vā samaṇaḥ

original: gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’”ti?
analyzed: gotamaḥ dhammam deseti iti

original: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: na kho no bhante bhagavati evam hoti

original: ‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ
analyzed: cīvara hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhammam deseti piṇḍapāta hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhamma

original: deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo
analyzed: deseti senāsana hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhammam deseti iti bhava abhava hetu vā samaṇaḥ

original: gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’”ti.
analyzed: gotamaḥ dhammam deseti iti

original: “Na ca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: na ca kira vaḥ bhikkhave mayi evam hoti

original: ‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ deseti …pe…
analyzed: cīvara hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhammam deseti pe

original: itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṁ desetī’ti;
analyzed: iti bhava abhava hetu vā samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ dhammam deseti iti

original: atha kinti carahi vo, bhikkhave, mayi hotī”ti?
analyzed: atha kinti carahi vaḥ bhikkhave mayi hoti iti

original: “Evaṁ kho no, bhante, bhagavati hoti:
analyzed: evam kho naḥ bhante bhagavati hoti

original: ‘anukampako bhagavā hitesī;
analyzed: anukampakaḥ bhagavā hitesī

original: anukampaṁ upādāya dhammaṁ desetī’”ti.
analyzed: anukampam upādāya dhammaṃ deseti iti

original: “Evañca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi hoti:
analyzed: evam ca kira vaḥ bhikkhave mayi hoti

original: ‘anukampako bhagavā hitesī;
analyzed: anukampakaḥ bhagavā hitesī

original: anukampaṁ upādāya dhammaṁ desetī’ti.
analyzed: anukampam upādāya dhammaṃ deseti iti

original: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: tasmāt iha bhikkhave ye vaḥ mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā

original: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca
analyzed: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañca indriyāni pañca

original: balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi
analyzed: balāni satta bojjhaṅgāḥ ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo tattha sabbehi iva samaggehi sammodamānehi

original: avivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: a vivadamānehi sikkhitabba

original: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ siyaṁsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā.
analyzed: tesam ca vaḥ bhikkhave samaggānam sammodamānānam a vivadamānānam sikkhatam dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā

original: Tatra ce tumhākaṁ evamassa:
analyzed: tatra ce tumhākam evam assa

original: ‘imesaṁ kho āyasmantānaṁ atthato ceva nānaṁ byañjanato ca nānan’ti, tattha yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: imesam kho āyasmantānam atthato ca iva nānam byañjanato ca nānanti tattha yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
analyzed: āyasmantānam kho atthato ca iva nānā byañjanato ca nānā

original: Tadamināpetaṁ āyasmanto jānātha—
analyzed: tat aminā apetam āyasmantaḥ jānātha

original: yathā atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
analyzed: yathā atthato ca iva nānā byañjanato ca nānā

original: Māyasmanto vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
analyzed: mā ayasmantaḥ vivādam āpajjittha iti

original: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: atha aparesam ekatopakkhikānam bhikkhūnam yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
analyzed: āyasmantānam kho atthato ca iva nānā byañjanato ca nānā

original: Tadamināpetaṁ āyasmanto jānātha—
analyzed: tat aminā apetam āyasmantaḥ jānātha

original: yathā atthato ceva nānaṁ, byañjanato ca nānaṁ.
analyzed: yathā atthato ca iva nānā byañjanato ca nānā

original: Māyasmanto vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
analyzed: mā ayasmantaḥ vivādam āpajjittha iti

original: Iti duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretabbaṁ, suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: iti duggahitam duggahitataḥ dhāretabba suggahitam suggahitataḥ dhāretabba

original: Duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretvā suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
analyzed: duggahitam duggahitataḥ dhāretvā suggahitam suggahitataḥ dhāretvā yaḥ dhammaḥ yaḥ vinayo saḥ bhāsitabbo

original: Tatra ce tumhākaṁ evamassa:
analyzed: tatra ce tumhākam evam assa

original: ‘imesaṁ kho āyasmantānaṁ atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sametī’ti, tattha yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: imesam kho āyasmantānam atthataḥ hi kho nānā byañjanataḥ sameti iti tattha yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
analyzed: āyasmantānam kho atthataḥ hi nānā byañjanataḥ sameti

original: Tadamināpetaṁ āyasmanto jānātha—
analyzed: tat aminā apetam āyasmantaḥ jānātha

original: yathā atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
analyzed: yathā atthataḥ hi kho nānā byañjanataḥ sameti

original: Māyasmanto vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
analyzed: mā ayasmantaḥ vivādam āpajjittha iti

original: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: atha aparesam ekatopakkhikānam bhikkhūnam yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
analyzed: āyasmantānam kho atthataḥ hi kho nānā byañjanataḥ sameti

original: Tadamināpetaṁ āyasmanto jānātha—
analyzed: tat aminā apetam āyasmantaḥ jānātha

original: yathā atthato hi kho nānaṁ, byañjanato sameti.
analyzed: yathā atthataḥ hi kho nānā byañjanataḥ sameti

original: Māyasmanto vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
analyzed: mā ayasmantaḥ vivādam āpajjittha iti

analyzed: iti duggahitam duggahitataḥ dhāretabba suggahitam suggahitataḥ dhāretabba

original: Duggahitaṁ duggahitato dhāretvā suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
analyzed: duggahitam duggahitataḥ dhāretvā suggahitam suggahitataḥ dhāretvā yaḥ dhammaḥ yaḥ vinayo saḥ bhāsitabbo

original: Tatra ce tumhākaṁ evamassa:
analyzed: tatra ce tumhākam evam assa

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi sameti, byañjanato nānaṁ.
analyzed: āyasmantānam kho atthataḥ hi sameti byañjanataḥ nānā

original: Tadamināpetaṁ āyasmanto jānātha—
analyzed: tat aminā apetam āyasmantaḥ jānātha

original: yathā atthato hi kho sameti, byañjanato nānaṁ.
analyzed: yathā atthataḥ hi kho sameti byañjanataḥ nānā

original: Appamattakaṁ kho panetaṁ yadidaṁ—byañjanaṁ.
analyzed: appamattakam kho pana itam yat idam abyañjana

original: Māyasmanto appamattake vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.

analyzed: atha aparesam ekatopakkhikānam bhikkhūnam yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato hi sameti, byañjanato nānaṁ.
analyzed: āyasmantānam kho atthataḥ hi sameti byañjanataḥ nānā

analyzed: tat aminā apetam āyasmantaḥ jānātha

analyzed: yathā atthataḥ hi kho sameti byañjanataḥ nānā

original: Appamattakaṁ kho panetaṁ yadidaṁ—byañjanaṁ.
analyzed: appamattakam kho pana itam yat idam abyañjana

original: Māyasmanto appamattake vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
analyzed: mā ayasmantaḥ appamattake vivādam āpajjittha ati

analyzed: iti suggahitam suggahitataḥ dhāretabba duggahitam duggahitataḥ dhāretabba

analyzed: yathā atthataḥ ca iva sameti byañjanataḥ ca sameti

original: Māyasmanto vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
analyzed: mā ayasmantaḥ vivādam āpajjittha iti

original: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: atha aparesam ekatopakkhikānam bhikkhūnam yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘āyasmantānaṁ kho atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
analyzed: āyasmantānam kho atthataḥ ca iva sameti byañjanataḥ ca sameti

original: Tadamināpetaṁ āyasmanto jānātha—
analyzed: tat aminā apetam āyasmantaḥ jānātha

original: yathā atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
analyzed: yathā atthataḥ ca iva sameti byañjanataḥ ca sameti

original: Māyasmanto vivādaṁ āpajjitthā’ti.
analyzed: mā ayasmantaḥ vivādam āpajjittha iti

original: Iti suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: iti suggahitam suggahitataḥ

original: Suggahitaṁ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
analyzed: suggahitam suggahitataḥ dhāretvā yaḥ dhammaḥ yaḥ vinayo saḥ bhāsitabbo

original: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti siyā vītikkamo,
analyzed: tesam ca vaḥ bhikkhave samaggānam sammodamānānam a vivadamānānam sikkhatam siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti siyā vītikkamaḥ

original: tatra, bhikkhave, na codanāya taritabbaṁ. Puggalo upaparikkhitabbo:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave na codanāya puggalo upaparikkhitabbo

original: ‘iti mayhañca avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghāto, paro hi puggalo
analyzed: iti mayham ca avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa an upaghāto paraḥ hi puggalo

original: akkodhano anupanāhī adaḷhadiṭṭhī suppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā
analyzed: a kodhanaḥ an upanāhī a daḷha diṭṭhī su paṭinissaggī sakkomi ca aham etam puggalam akusalā

original: vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetunti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kallaṁ vacanāya.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave evam assa kallam vacanāya

original: Sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa:
analyzed: sace pana bhikkhave evam assa

original: ‘mayhaṁ kho avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto, paro hi puggalo kodhano
analyzed: mayham kho avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghātaḥ paraḥ hi puggalaḥ kodhanaḥ

original: upanāhī adaḷhadiṭṭhī suppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā
analyzed: upanāhī a daḷha diṭṭhī suppaṭinissaggī sakkomi ca aham etam puggalam akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā

original: kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṁ.
analyzed: kusale patiṭṭhāpetu

original: Appamattakaṁ kho panetaṁ yadidaṁ—parassa puggalassa upaghāto.
analyzed: appamattakam kho pana etam yat idam aparassa puggalassa upaghātaḥ

original: Atha kho etadeva bahutaraṁ—
analyzed: atha khalu etat eva bahutara

original: svāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
analyzed: svāham sakkomi etam puggalam akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetunti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kallaṁ vacanāya.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave evam assa kallam vacanāya

original: Sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa:
analyzed: sace pana bhikkhave evam assa

original: ‘mayhaṁ kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghāto. Paro hi puggalo akkodhano
analyzed: mayham kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa an upaghātaḥ paraḥ hi puggalaḥ a kodhanaḥ

original: anupanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā
analyzed: an upanāhī daḷha diṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī sakkomi ca aham etam puggalam akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā

original: kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṁ.
analyzed: kusale patiṭṭhāpetu

original: Appamattakaṁ kho panetaṁ yadidaṁ—mayhaṁ vihesā.
analyzed: appamattakam kho pana itam yat idam ayham vihesā

original: Atha kho etadeva bahutaraṁ—
analyzed: atha khalu etat eva bahutara

original: svāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
analyzed: svāham sakkomi etam puggalam akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetunti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kallaṁ vacanāya.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave evam assa kallam vacanāya

original: Sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa:
analyzed: sace pana bhikkhave evam assa

original: ‘mayhañca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto. Paro hi puggalo kodhano
analyzed: mayham ca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghātaḥ paraḥ hi puggalaḥ kodhanaḥ

original: upanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṁ etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā
analyzed: upanāhī daḷha diṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī sakkomi ca aham etam puggalam akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā

original: kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṁ.
analyzed: kusale patiṭṭhāpetu

original: Appamattakaṁ kho panetaṁ yadidaṁ—mayhañca vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto.
analyzed: appamattakam kho pana etam yat idam ayham ca vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghātaḥ

original: Atha kho etadeva bahutaraṁ—
analyzed: atha khalu etat eva bahutara

original: svāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
analyzed: svāham sakkomi etam puggalam akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetunti

original: Sace, bhikkhave, evamassa, kallaṁ vacanāya.
analyzed: sace bhikkhave evam assa kallam vacanāya

original: Sace pana, bhikkhave, evamassa:
analyzed: sace pana bhikkhave evam assa

original: ‘mayhañca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto. Paro hi puggalo kodhano
analyzed: mayham ca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghātaḥ paraḥ hi puggalaḥ kodhanaḥ

original: upanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, na cāhaṁ sakkomi etaṁ puggalaṁ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā
analyzed: upanāhī daḷha diṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī na ca aham sakkomi etam puggalam akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā

original: kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
analyzed: kusale patiṭṭhāpetunti

original: Evarūpe, bhikkhave, puggale upekkhā nātimaññitabbā.
analyzed: evarūpe bhikkhave puggale upekkhā na atimaññitabbā

original: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppajjeyya diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi.
analyzed: tesam ca vaḥ bhikkhave samaggānam sammodamānānam a vivadamānānam sikkhatam aññamaññassa vacīsahāraḥ uppajjeyya diṭṭhi paḷāsaḥ cetasaḥ āghātaḥ appaccayaḥ an abhiraddhi

original: Tattha ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: tattha ekatopakkhikānam bhikkhūnam yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa
analyzed: yam no āvuso amhākam samaggānam sammodamānānam a vivadamānānam sikkhatam aññamaññassa

original: vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṁ jānamāno
analyzed: vacīsahāraḥ uppannaḥ diṭṭhi paḷāsaḥ cetasaḥ āghātaḥ appaccayaḥ tam jānamāno

original: samaṇo garaheyyā’ti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ garaheyya iti

original: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: sammā byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu evam byākareyya

original: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa
analyzed: yam no āvuso amhākam samaggānam sammodamānānam a vivadamānānam sikkhatam aññamaññassa

original: vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṁ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyāti.
analyzed: vacīsahāraḥ uppannaḥ diṭṭhi paḷāsaḥ cetasaḥ āghātaḥ appaccayaḥ anabhiraddhi tam jānamānaḥ samaṇaḥ garaheyya ati

original: Etaṁ panāvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
analyzed: etam pana āvuso dhammam a pahāya nibbānam sacchikareyya ati

original: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: sammā byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu evam byākareyya

original: ‘etaṁ, āvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya na nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
analyzed: ete āvuso dhammam a pahāya na nibbānam sacchikareyya ati

original: Athāparesaṁ ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha, so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: atha aparesam ekatopakkhikānam bhikkhūnam yam bhikkhum suvacataram maññeyyātha saḥ upasaṅkamitvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa
analyzed: yam no āvuso amhākam samaggānam sammodamānānam a vivadamānānam sikkhatam aññamaññassa

original: vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṁ jānamāno
analyzed: vacīsahāraḥ uppannaḥ diṭṭhi paḷāsaḥ cetasaḥ āghātaḥ appaccayaḥ tam jānamāno

original: samaṇo garaheyyā’ti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ garaheyya iti

original: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: sammā byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu evam byākareyya

original: ‘yaṁ no, āvuso, amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa
analyzed: yam no āvuso amhākam samaggānam sammodamānānam a vivadamānānam sikkhatam aññamaññassa

original: vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi taṁ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyāti.
analyzed: vacīsahāraḥ uppannaḥ diṭṭhi paḷāsaḥ cetasaḥ āghātaḥ appaccayaḥ anabhiraddhi tam jānamānaḥ samaṇaḥ garaheyya ati

original: Etaṁ panāvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
analyzed: etam pana āvuso dhammam a pahāya nibbānam sacchikareyya ati

original: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: sammā byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu evam byākareyya

original: ‘etaṁ kho, āvuso, dhammaṁ appahāya na nibbānaṁ sacchikareyyā’ti.
analyzed: etam kho āvuso dhammam a pahāya na nibbānam sacchikareyya ati

original: Tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ pare evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: tat ce bhikkhave bhikkhum pare evam puccheyyu

original: ‘āyasmatā no ete bhikkhū akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpitā’ti?
analyzed: āyasmatā no ete bhikkhū akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpitā ati

original: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
analyzed: sammā byākaramānaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu evam byākareyya

original: ‘idhāhaṁ, āvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁ, tassa me bhagavā dhammaṁ desesi, tāhaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhāsiṁ.
analyzed: idha āha āvuso yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami tassa me bhagavā dhammam desesi tāham dhammam sutvā tesam bhikkhūnam abhāsi

original: Taṁ te bhikkhū dhammaṁ sutvā akusalā vuṭṭhahiṁsu, kusale patiṭṭhahiṁsū’ti.
analyzed: tam te bhikkhū dhammam sutvā akusalāḥ vuṭṭhahisu kusale patiṭṭhahisu iti

original: Evaṁ byākaramāno kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ceva attānaṁ ukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti,
analyzed: evam byākaramānaḥ kho bhikkhave bhikkhu na ca iva attānam ukkaseti na param vambheti

original: dhammassa cānudhammaṁ byākaroti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchatī”ti.
analyzed: dhammassa ca anudhammam byākaroti na ca koci sahadhammikaḥ vāda anuvādaḥ gārayham ṭhānam āgacchati iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Kintisuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: kinti suttam niṭṭhitam tatiya
